attributes.action: Call for an early General Election.
attributes.additional_details: It is a core convention of the UK constitution that the Government must be able to command the confidence of the House of Commons. This should also apply to those who elected them.
attributes.background: Table a motion of No Confidence Under Sect 2 of the Fixed Term Parliament Act 2011

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557074
